name: EOL - remove: move uBO picker (older than 1.24.0)
description:
uBO 1.23.1b17 add movable: https://github.com/gorhill/uBlock/releases/tag/1.24.0 From: https://github.com/gorhill/uBlock/wiki/Element-picker

Tip:

You can easily move element picker dialog using mouse, by grabbing and dragging by empty space between buttons New in 1.23.1b17

uBO 1.29.3+ added protection to inject inline Stylus style for element picker. So this CSS is no longer needed, because is no compatible:
  • - glitch aside size in few position
  • - block move
  • - limit space to move.
Added in style code "aside:not([class]):not([style])" should fix only few troubles.
obsoletion_message: No longer needed, no possible fix glitch after first move with CSS only.
css: /* I decided to delete the CSS code, at the addon/extension level when it tries to download an update */
